To get a table in MySQL you must use stored procedure :

DELIMITER ^ 
PROCEDURE `CreateList`(IN `num` INT)
BEGIN
    DECLARE cnt INT; 
    SET cnt = 1;
    create TEMPORARY table t (i int);
    sloop:LOOP 
        if (cnt <= num) 
            THEN SET cnt = cnt +1;
            insert into t value(cnt);
        ELSE LEAVE sloop;
        END IF;

    END LOOP;
    select * from t;
END
title: MySQL function for count looping
